page.title: 16BASSINGBOURN PLACE NAMES
page.content: These lists show places named after _ {THINGS PEOPLE Spring Lane{-spring} Clarke's Way Brook Road{ _brook } Pepper Close Walnut Tree Close Willmott Road Mill Lane { _water } Knutsford Road Tower Close{_windmill} Nightingale Ave Tanyard { _tannery } Guise Lane Church Close{_church }Bassingbourn Fillance{ _field lands } Canberra Close{_aircraft } Wellington Place {.. } { Lord Knutsford}lived at Kneesworth Hall in the early 20th Century. The{Nightingale}family owned land in the 18th Century. The{Guise}family owned land in 1302. Between 1300 and 1550 lots of road names we still use were recorded:- Northend in 1345, Shadbury Lane (1510) Cause Lane (1549) & Fenne End (1532). { Basa's}Saxon folk lived by the brook.
